6 
7 #ifndef USB_DEV_DEFS_H_
8 #define USB_DEV_DEFS_H_
9 
10 
11 /* bmRequest Dir */
12 #define USB_DEV_REQUEST_HOST_TO_DEVICE 0
13 #define USB_DEV_REQUEST_DEVICE_TO_HOST 1
14 
15 /* bmRequest Type */
16 #define USB_DEV_REQUEST_STANDARD 0
17 #define USB_DEV_REQUEST_CLASS 1
18 #define USB_DEV_REQUEST_VENDOR 2
19 #define USB_DEV_REQUEST_RESERVED 3
20 
21 /* bmRequest Recipient */
22 #define USB_DEV_REQUEST_TO_DEVICE 0
23 #define USB_DEV_REQUEST_TO_INTERFACE 1
24 #define USB_DEV_REQUEST_TO_ENDPOINT 2
25 #define USB_DEV_REQUEST_TO_OTHER 3
26 
27 
28 
29 /* USB Standard Request Codes */
30 #define USB_DEV_REQUEST_GET_STATUS 0
31 #define USB_DEV_REQUEST_CLEAR_FEATURE 1
32 #define USB_DEV_REQUEST_SET_FEATURE 3
33 #define USB_DEV_REQUEST_SET_ADDRESS 5
34 #define USB_DEV_REQUEST_GET_DESCRIPTOR 6
35 #define USB_DEV_REQUEST_SET_DESCRIPTOR 7
36 #define USB_DEV_REQUEST_GET_CONFIGURATION 8
37 #define USB_DEV_REQUEST_SET_CONFIGURATION 9
38 #define USB_DEV_REQUEST_GET_INTERFACE 10
39 #define USB_DEV_REQUEST_SET_INTERFACE 11
40 #define USB_DEV_REQUEST_SYNC_FRAME 12
41 
42 /* USB GET_STATUS Bit Values */
43 #define USB_GETSTATUS_SELF_POWERED 0x01
44 #define USB_GETSTATUS_REMOTE_WAKEUP 0x02
45 #define USB_GETSTATUS_ENDPOINT_STALL 0x01
46 
47 /* USB Standard Feature selectors */
48 #define USB_FEATURE_ENDPOINT_STALL 0
49 #define USB_FEATURE_REMOTE_WAKEUP 1
50 
51 
52 /* USB Descriptor Types */
53 #define USB_DEVICE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE 1
54 #define USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE 2
55 #define USB_STRING_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE 3
56 #define USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE 4
57 #define USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE 5
58 #define USB_DEVICE_QUALIFIER_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE 6
59 #define USB_OTHER_SPEED_CONFIG_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE 7
60 #define USB_INTERFACE_POWER_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE 8
61 #define USB_OTG_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE 9
62 #define USB_DEBUG_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE 10
63 #define USB_INTERFACE_ASSOCIATION_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE 11
64 
65 /* USB Device Classes */
66 #define USB_DEVICE_CLASS_RESERVED 0x00
67 #define USB_DEVICE_CLASS_AUDIO 0x01
68 #define USB_DEVICE_CLASS_COMMUNICATIONS 0x02
69 #define USB_DEVICE_CLASS_HUMAN_INTERFACE 0x03
70 #define USB_DEVICE_CLASS_MONITOR 0x04
71 #define USB_DEVICE_CLASS_PHYSICAL_INTERFACE 0x05
72 #define USB_DEVICE_CLASS_POWER 0x06
73 #define USB_DEVICE_CLASS_PRINTER 0x07
74 #define USB_DEVICE_CLASS_STORAGE 0x08
75 #define USB_DEVICE_CLASS_HUB 0x09
76 #define USB_DEVICE_CLASS_MISCELLANEOUS 0xEF
77 #define USB_DEVICE_CLASS_DFU 0xEF
78 #define USB_DEVICE_CLASS_VENDOR_SPECIFIC 0xFF
79 
80 /* USB Interface Classes */
81 #define USB_INTERFACE_CLASS_COMMUNICATIONS 0x02
82 #define USB_INTERFACE_CLASS_COMMUNICATIONS_DATA 0x0A
83 #define USB_INTERFACE_SUBCLASS_ACM 0x02
84 #define USB_INTERFACE_PROTOCOL_V25TER 0x01
85 
86 
87 /* bmAttributes in Configuration Descriptor */
88 #define USB_CONFIG_POWERED_MASK 0x40
89 #define USB_CONFIG_BUS_POWERED 0x80
90 #define USB_CONFIG_SELF_POWERED 0xC0
91 #define USB_CONFIG_REMOTE_WAKEUP 0x20
92 
93 /* bMaxPower in Configuration Descriptor */
94 #define USB_CONFIG_POWER_MA(mA) ((mA)/2)
95 
96 /* bEndpointAddress in Endpoint Descriptor */
97 #define USB_ENDPOINT_DIRECTION_MASK 0x80
98 #define USB_ENDPOINT_OUT (0x00)
99 #define USB_ENDPOINT_IN (0x80)
100 
101 /* bmAttributes in Endpoint Descriptor */
102 #define USB_ENDPOINT_TYPE_MASK 0x03
103 #define USB_ENDPOINT_TYPE_CONTROL 0x00
104 #define USB_ENDPOINT_TYPE_ISOCHRONOUS 0x01
105 #define USB_ENDPOINT_TYPE_BULK 0x02
106 #define USB_ENDPOINT_TYPE_INTERRUPT 0x03
107 #define USB_ENDPOINT_SYNC_MASK 0x0C
108 #define USB_ENDPOINT_SYNC_NO_SYNCHRONIZATION 0x00
109 #define USB_ENDPOINT_SYNC_ASYNCHRONOUS 0x04
110 #define USB_ENDPOINT_SYNC_ADAPTIVE 0x08
111 #define USB_ENDPOINT_SYNC_SYNCHRONOUS 0x0C
112 #define USB_ENDPOINT_USAGE_MASK 0x30
113 #define USB_ENDPOINT_USAGE_DATA 0x00
114 #define USB_ENDPOINT_USAGE_FEEDBACK 0x10
115 #define USB_ENDPOINT_USAGE_IMPLICIT_FEEDBACK 0x20
116 #define USB_ENDPOINT_USAGE_RESERVED 0x30
117 
118 
119 //Part of DFU descriptors
120 #define USB_DEV_DFU_INTERFACE_NUM_ENDPOINTS 0x00 //Use control pipe
121 #define USB_DEV_DFU_INTERFACE_CLASS 0xFE
122 #define USB_DEV_DFU_INTERFACE_SUBCLASS 0x01
123 #define USB_DEV_DFU_INTERFACE_PROTOCOL 0x02
124 
125 //Run time descriptor is part of run time descriptors
126 #define USB_DEV_DFU_RUNTIME_INTERFACE_ALTERNATE_SETTING 0x00
127 #define USB_DEV_DFU_RUNTIME_INTERFACE_NUM_ENDPOINTS 0x00 //Use control pipe
128 #define USB_DEV_DFU_RUNTIME_INTERFACE_CLASS USB_DEV_DFU_INTERFACE_CLASS
129 #define USB_DEV_DFU_RUNTIME_INTERFACE_SUBCLASS USB_DEV_DFU_INTERFACE_SUBCLASS
130 #define USB_DEV_DFU_RUNTIME_INTERFACE_PROTOCOL 0x01
131 
132 
133 #define USB_DEV_DFU_ATTRIBUTES_WILL_DETACH (1<<3)
134 #define USB_DEV_DFU_ATTRIBUTES_MANIFESTATION_TOLERANT (1<<2)
135 #define USB_DEV_DFU_ATTRIBUTES_CAN_UPLOAD (1<<1)
136 #define USB_DEV_DFU_ATTRIBUTES_CAN_DOWNLOAD (1<<0)
137 
138 #define USB_DEV_DFU_FUNCTIONAL_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE 0x21
139 
140 #define USB_DEV_DFU_SUBCLASS 0x00
141 #define USB_DEV_DFU_REQUEST_TYPE 0x21
142 
143 //DFU requests
144 #define USB_DEV_DFU_DETACH 0
145 #define USB_DEV_DFU_DNLOAD 1
146 #define USB_DEV_DFU_UPLOAD 2
147 #define USB_DEV_DFU_GETSTATUS 3
148 #define USB_DEV_DFU_CLRSTATUS 4
149 #define USB_DEV_DFU_GETSTATE 5
150 #define USB_DEV_DFU_ABORT 6
151 
152 enum {
153  appIDLE,
154  appDETACH,
155  dfuIDLE,
156  dfuDNLOAD_SYNC,
157  dfuDNBUSY,
158  dfuDNLOAD_IDLE,
159  dfuMANIFEST_SYNC,
160  dfuMANIFEST,
161  dfuMANIFEST_WAIT_RESET,
162  dfuUPLOAD_IDLE,
163  dfuERROR
164 };
165 
166 enum {
167  OK,
168  errTARGET,
169  errFILE,
170  errWRITE,
171  errERASE,
172  errCHECK_ERASED,
173  errPROG,
174  errVERFIY,
175  errADDRESS,
176  errNOTDONE,
177  errFIRMWARE,
178  errVENDOR,
179  errUSBR,
180  errUNKNOWN,
181  errSTALLEDPKT
182 };
